mappings.response: =string.concat("Message sent to: ", $activity[SendMessage].output.messages.to," Message Body: ", $activity[ReadMessage].output.messages.messages[1].sid," Number found at index 1: ", string.tostring($activity[FindNumbers].output.numbers.available_phone_numbers[1].phone_number)," Number purchased: ", $activity[PurchaseNumber].output.numbers.phone_number)
